name: 10 True or False Questions | General Trivia Quiz

questions.text: Toronto is the capital of Canada.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Ottawa is the Capital of Canada. Toronto is the Capital of Ontario.

questions.text: Sylvester Stallone has been nominated for both an Academy Award for 'Best Actor' and a Razzie Award for 'Worst Actor' for playing the same role.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Yes, he was nominated for 'Best Actor' in Rocky and 'Worst Actor' for Rocky V, playing the same role of Rocky Balboa.

questions.text: 'Call Me Ishmael' is the first line of the book 'Tom Sawyer'.
questions.explanation:
False.

	It's the first line to the book 'Moby Dick'.

questions.text: In the US version of the game 'Monopoly', the color of Vermont Avenue is dark blue.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Its color is light blue. Boardwalk and Park Place are dark blue.

questions.text: In tennis, The Australian Open is one of the four tournaments making up the Grand Slam.
questions.explanation:
True.

	The Australian Open, The French Open, Wimbledon, and The US Open comprise the Grand Slam in tennis.

questions.text: Before becoming Governor of Texas, George W. Bush was co-owner of a professional baseball team.
questions.explanation:
True.

	He was a co-owner of the Texas Rangers.

questions.text: An elephant can smell water over 3 miles away.
The TV Show 'All in the Family' is based on a British TV Show.
questions.explanation:
True.

	It is based on the TV Show 'Til Death Us Do Part.'

questions.text: The doctor who tended to John Wilkes Booth after he shot Abraham Lincoln's name was Mudd.
Dennis the Menace's favorite beverage is water.
questions.explanation:
False.

	His favorite is root beer.
